resources.string: Ideal app for creating and scheduling tasks!
Scheduler has all necessary functional, that must be in such app, exactly it is managing your tasks. You may add new tasks, postpone, delete and edit them.
There is also the timer, that helps you to split your time into approaches. Scientists have proved that optimal time of approach for all kind of works is 25 minutes.

If you swipe left to right, you will make your task done, if you swipe right to left, you will postpone the task. \n If you click on the task you will see detailed information about it. On this page you also make note done, postpone it. In addition, you can edit or completely delete the task. There is also a timer there.
